description:
Open Sudoku is an Open Source Sudoku game.
Open Sudoku is an Open Source Sudoku game.

Features:
	• Without ads
	• Puzzles can be downloaded from web, entered by hand or generated on the project's homepage
	• Game stats (time spent, mistakes)
	• Next step hints with multiple strategies suggestions
	• Import to and export from a file
	• Visual themes including custom theme editor
	• Several input modes (finger-friendly numpad, popup, keyboard etc.)
	• Double pencil marks
…and much more.

More information (including how to report ideas and issues) can be found on the project's home page: http://opensudoku.moire.org.
